mapper.select: SELECT partner.partner_name, product_category.id as product_category_id, concat(product_category.category_name,' ',product_category.category_sub_name) as category_name, product.*, (select count(*) from product_plan pp where pp.product_id = product.id) as number_of_plan FROM product left join partner on partner.id = product.partner_id left join product_category_relation on product_category_relation.product_id = product.id left join product_category on product_category.id = product_category_relation.product_category_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
